mapper.sql: t0.*,t1.fid feid,t1.foid ,t1.fobillid,t1.fonumber,t1.fentryid,t1.fmaid,t1.fqty,t1.fdate,t1.fbillid,t1.feligqty,t1.funqty,t1.freason ,t1.fresult,t1.fbatch,t1.fguartime ,t1.fdeltime ,t1.fstockid,t2.fid suid,t2.supplierNumber sunumber,t2.supplierName suname, t3.fid crid,t3.username crname,t4.fid auid,t4.username auname,t5.fid fmaid,t5.materialNumber,t5.materialName,t5.materialModel, t5.materialUnit,t6.fid fstid,t6.stocknumber,t6.stockname,t6.stockaddress,t6.stocktel
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from T_VS_BillCheck t0 left join T_VS_BillCheckEntry t1 on t0.fid=t1.fbillid left join T_VS_Supplier t2 on t0.fsupplierid=t2.fid left join T_VS_User t3 on t0.fcruid=t3.fid left join T_VS_User t4 on t0.fchuid=t4.fid left join T_VS_Material t5 on t1.fmaid=t5.fid left join T_VS_Stock t6 on t1.fstockid=t6.fid
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from T_VS_BillCheck t0 left join T_VS_BillCheckEntry t1 on t0.fid=t1.fbillid left join T_VS_Supplier t2 on t0.fsupplierid=t2.fid left join T_VS_User t3 on t0.fcruid=t3.fid left join T_VS_User t4 on t0.fchuid=t4.fid left join T_VS_Material t5 on t1.fmaid=t5.fid left join T_VS_Stock t6 on t1.fstockid=t6.fid where t0.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into T_VS_BillCheck
fnumber,
fbizdate,
fsupplierid,
fcruid,
fchuid,
fcretime,
fchetime,
fstatus,
fboxno,
fisqt
#{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{fsupplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fcruid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fchuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fcretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{fchetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fboxno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fisqt,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
update T_VS_BillCheck
fid = #{record.fid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fnumber = #{record.fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fbizdate = #{record.fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fsupplierid = #{record.fsupplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fcruid = #{record.fcruid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fchuid = #{record.fchuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fcretime = #{record.fcretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fchetime = #{record.fchetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fstatus = #{record.fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fboxno=#{fboxno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fisqt=#{fisqt,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update T_VS_BillCheck set fid = #{record.fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fnumber = #{record.fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbizdate = #{record.fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fsupplierid = #{record.fsupplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcruid = #{record.fcruid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fchuid = #{record.fchuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcretime = #{record.fcretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fchetime = #{record.fchetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fstatus = #{record.fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fboxno=#{fboxno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fisqt=#{fisqt,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update T_VS_BillCheck
fnumber = #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fbizdate = #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fsupplierid = #{fsupplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fcruid = #{fcruid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fchuid = #{fchuid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fcretime = #{fcretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fchetime = #{fchetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fstatus = #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update T_VS_BillCheck set fnumber = #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbizdate = #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fsupplierid = #{fsupplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcruid = #{fcruid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fchuid = #{fchuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fcretime = #{fcretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fchetime = #{fchetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fstatus = #{fstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fboxno=#{fboxno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fisqt=#{fisqt,jdbcType=INTEGER} where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
